summary: TOOK MY 2014 NISSAN ROGUE TO NISSAN DEALER, BECAUSE THE CAR WAS SLIPPING AND LOSING RPMS. DEALER TOLD ME THAT THE RADIATOR HAD FAILED INTERNALLY CAUSING TRANSMISSION ISSUE. THEY ARE SAYING THAT I NEED TO REPLACE THE RADIATOR, HOSES SOME OTHER STUFF AND THE TRANSMISSION. THEY ESTIMATED IT AT THIS TIME AT $6000. I WAS ON MY WAY TO WORK 40 MINUTES FROM MY HOUSE AND HAD TO HAVE THE CAR TOWED BACK TO THE DEALERSHIP. THE CAR ONLY HAS 75,000 MILES ON IT.
